original_text: Isaiah had already said this: ‘The Lord of great power has let some of our children live. If he had not done that, no descendants would remain. We would have become like the people in Sodom and Gomorrah.’ 9: See Isaiah 1:9 and Genesis 19:1-29. Sodom and Gomorrah were small towns. The people who lived there refused to obey God. So God destroyed those towns. Isaiah had already said this: ‘The Lord of great power has let some of our children live. If he had not done that, no descendants would remain. korean_text: 또한 이사야가 미리 말한 바 만일 만군의 주께서 우리에게 씨를 남겨 두지 아니하셨더라면 우리가 소돔과 같이 되고 고모라와 같았으리로다 함과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: has let some of our children live
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 자녀 중 일부를 살게 하셨습니다
